Keywords: A.I.M. , Illuminati , Intelligencia , Maggia , Robot , Scientist
Real Name: Julius
Special Powers
SIMULACRUM BODY: When Mad Thinker would be KO'd, you may instead replace him with a FFFF #13a Mad Thinker on its red starting line and that character may be placed in a square within 6 squares of the square this character occupied. Protected: Pulse Wave.
PROBABILITY OBSESSION: Probability Control, but only to target characters with the Robot keyword regardless of range or line of fire.

March 4, 2021
GRENDELX
I think you could make pretty good use of him on an A.I.M. team with M.O.D.A.K. having the Robot Keyword
February 25, 2021
Jarosa
Another Mad Thinker made for Robot theme team builds. This version brings a bit more and can be used outside Robot teams effectively. You basically get 8 clicks if you own the other Mad Thinker. So he shines on Robot teams thanks to Prob but 8 clicks of mixed support and attack is great for 40 points.
February 20, 2021
KillerKing
Really good support piece, unfortunately only if you are playing a robot team.
February 11, 2021
Goop
Prob for only 40pts. You will also almost always have outwit or perplex along with it. Great for cost, but only really for robot teams.
